name: No Name Village (Demo)
description:
Summary:

No Name Village is a top-down adventure game, with RPG elements mixed in, set in a peaceful village that is at risk of being swallowed by the Black Sea. Follow our boy protagonist, as he slowly uncovers the situation of the world around him.

Controls:

Arrow keys:     Move Character

'X': Select/ Interact/ Attack

'Z': Return/ Dodge

'C': Switch Character

'A': Heal

'ESC': Menu

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Hello all!

Just some information about this demo.

The story is separated by seasons. As this demo starts on the second, there might be some unexplained details, story-wise.

Another thing to note... there's probably bugs. I squished as many as I could, but I'm 100% certain there's some I've missed. Do point it out if you find some.

If you happen to find yourself stuck on a tree, you can fast travel back to the village in the map if you're not aggroed. Also, save regularly!

Other than that though, have fun!

Twitter: @MastahPie
